outputs.output_descr: new project establishing a Justice Sector Facility will work across the sector to strengthen institutional planning capacities across the sector as well as support two district pilots to improve the administration of criminal justice between agencies

Judicial Strengthening (JUST) will support in the area of improving court of administration and case management of the upper and lower judiciary of Bangladesh in order to creating access to justice for all.
The JSSD seeks to initiate a process for inclusive participatory national dialogue on the desirability, scope and design of a national strategy of the justice sector.
